CustomField.description: Clients with shared SLAs will appear here.
CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT( Connected_Partner__c) = "JPM", IMAGE("https://myubiquity.file.force.com/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0681G000004KtSV&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T1G00000Dlnxm", "",30,60), IF(CONTAINS(TEXT( Connected_Partner__c), "Schwab"), IMAGE("https://myubiquity.file.force.com/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Jpg&versionId=0681G000004KtSa&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T1G00000Dlnxr", "",30,30), IF(CONTAINS(TEXT( Connected_Partner__c), "Simply"), IMAGE("https://myubiquity.file.force.com/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0681G000005uqev&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T1G00000M4jK2", "",50,150), "")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Clients with shared SLAs will appear here.
CustomField.label: Partner Logo
